text: mariyu (jnapakam cesukondi) ibrahim: "O na prabhu! Nivu mrtulanu ela sajivuluga cestavo naku cupu!" Ani annappudu, (allah) annadu: "Emi? Niku visvasam leda?" Daniki (ibrahim): "Undi, kani na manas'su trpti koraku adugu tunnanu!" Ani annadu. Apudu (allah): "Nalugu paksulanu tisuko, vatini baga maccika cesuko! Taruvata (vatini kosi) okkokkadani okkokka bhaganni, okkokka kondapai petti ra, malli vatini ram'mani piluvu, avi ni vaddaku egurukuntu vastayi. Kabatti niscayanga, allah sarvasaktimantudu, maha vivekavantudu ani telusuko!"Ani annadu
